citations.narrative:
Since the last inspection on 28 February 2024, the facility acquired and is exhibiting 4 red fox and 1 bat-eared fox. The
licensee’s existing license does not authorize the use of exotic and wild canids, such as foxes. Failure to obtain a license
for dangerous animals like exotic and wild canids could negatively impact the welfare of the exhibited animals and the
safety of the general public. A licensee must obtain a new license before using any animal beyond those types or
numbers of animals authorized under the existing license.
Correct by 23 December 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(ii) 
   
Requirements and application 
Since the last inspection on 28 February 2024, the facility acquired and is exhibiting 4 red fox and 1 bat-eared fox. The 
licensee’s existing license does not authorize the use of exotic and wild canids, such as foxes. Failure to obtain a license 
for dangerous animals like exotic and wild canids could negatively impact the welfare of the exhibited animals and the 
safety of the general public. A licensee must obtain a new license before using any animal beyond those types or 
numbers of animals authorized under the existing license. 
 
Correct by 23 December 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n
